channel.title: Tools on Big Data in Biomedicine
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Big Data in Biomedicine

item.title: CYANUS
item.description: R shiny app for the analysis of cytometry data with a focus on differential analysis.

item.title: namco
item.description: An R shiny app for the end-to-end analysis of 16S rRNA microbiome data.

item.title: DIGGER
item.description: Analyze protein-protein and domain-domain interactions in a joint graph.

item.title: NEASE
item.description: Network-based functional enrichment of alternative splicing.

item.title: CoVex
item.description: Drug repurposing on the Sars-CoV2 virus-host-drug interactome.

item.title: ASimulatoR
item.description: A simulator for RNA-seq data with alternative splicing events written in R.

item.title: EpiGEN
item.description: An easy-to-use Python pipeline for simulating epistasis data.

item.title: BiCoN
item.description: Network-constrained biclustering for patient stratification.

item.title: WSH
item.description: Computing within-sample heterogeneity scores from bisulfte sequencing data.

item.title: immunedeconv
item.description: A unifying package for in silico cell type deconvolution in immuno-oncology.

item.title: HouseKeepR
item.description: Mining GEO for tissue- and condition-specific normalization genes.

item.title: SPONGE
item.description: Inferring genome-wide networks of competing endogenous RNAs.

item.title: SPONGE
item.description: A pancancer database on competing endogenous RNA regulations.

item.title: KPM
item.description: de novo network enrichment to integrate multi-omics data with the interactome.

item.title: Athena
item.description: Mine the Arabidopsis THaliana ExpressioN Atlas across plant tissues.

item.title: BioAtlas
item.description: Process amplicon data and study microbial diversity across the globe.

item.title: DeepBlueR
item.description: A bioconductor package for accessing the DeepBlue epigenome analysis web server.

item.title: HiTSeekR
item.description: Analyse various types of high-throughput screening data.

item.title: JAMI
item.description: A fast Java tool for conditional mutual information in ceRNA inference.

item.title: MIRACLE
item.description: A web app for sample logistics and data analysis of reverse-phase protein arrays.

item.title: SAVANAH
item.description: A web app for sample logistics and visual inspection of high-throughput experiments.

item.title: OpenLabFramework
item.description: A laboratory information management system for functional genomics.
